'''Full Pankration Fonta Cup''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained when filling the [[Pankration Fonta Cup]] with Fonta at the [[New Fontaine Research Institute]] vending machine, next to [[Heinry]]. The Pankration Fonta Cup is obtained from the quest ''[[Both Brains and Brawn]]''<!--{{Quest|Both Brains and Brawn}}-->.

The Full Pankration Fonta Cup can be used from the Inventory in the same manner as regular [[Fonta]] to yield the same cosmetic effect, and will become an empty Pankration Fonta Cup again once used.

Using the Full Pankration Fonta Cup once will award the {{Achievement|The Final Fonta Sea (Tier 1)|nolabel=1}}, using it 13 times will award the {{Achievement|The Final Fonta Sea (Tier 2)|nolabel=1}}, and using it 16 times will award the {{Achievement|The Final Fonta Sea (Tier 3)|nolabel=1}}.
